entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as having a hard stone floor that Harry has prolonged contact with.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin returns with Sirius and is concerned about Harry's well-being.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as being at Lupin's heels and is concerned about Harry's well-being.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry has prolonged contact with Umbridge's hard stone floor and wants to talk to Sirius and Lupin about his dad.

relationships.description: Harry has prolonged contact with Umbridge's hard stone floor.
Lupin returns with Sirius at his heels.
Sirius is concerned about Harry's well-being.
Lupin is also concerned about Harry's well-being.
